name: incident-section-on-map-features-panel;regression-issue-lt-206-map-view-smoke-browser-chrome-context-chrome-feature-lt23-map-view-lt-22-map-feature-panel-capability-lt-23-map-view

tags.name: LT 23 Map View/LT-22 Map Feature Panel

title: Incident section on map features panel

testSteps.description: Given I am at the LiveTraffic Website

When I see all incident type icons and incident count
| Incident_Types |
| Roadworks |
| Changed Traffic Conditions |
| Low impact roadworks |
| Traffic signals |
| Crash |
| Breakdown |
| General Hazards |
| Adverse Weather |
| Flood |
| SnowIce |
| Fire |
| Public events |
And I see green tick in the righ hand corner of all incident type icons
When I unselect all incident type icons
Then I see no green tick in the incident type icons
Then I see incident count for each incident type
